price: Agyinatuo a efri ͻbonsam hͻ no ne deε ͻde bεma wͻn a wͻagye adie no werε ahoͻ, nanso ɔntumi nha wͻn wͻ hwee ho, gyesε Nyankopͻn ma kwan. Onyankopͻn na εsεsε agyidiefoͻ no de wͻn ho to Ne soͻ.
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّجۡوَىٰ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ لِيَحۡزُنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيۡسَ بِضَآرِّهِمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innamā al-najwā mina al-shayṭāni liyaḥzuna alladhīna āmanū walaysa biḍārrihim shayan illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
